title: _PAUSE_MENU_DISABLE_BUSYSPINNER
content:
0x9245E81072704B8A// PauseMenuDisableBusyspinner
void _PAUSE_MENU_DISABLE_BUSYSPINNER(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: true to disable and false to re-enable the loading icon.Disables the loading spinner in Pause Menu when switching from one header tab to another.
